verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that came to <S%H1954>Hosea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H882>Beeri,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> and <S%H3169>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> at <S%H8462>first<s%> by <S%H1954>Hosea,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1954>Hosea,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> for yourself a <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2183>prostitution<s%> and <S%H3206>children<s%> of <S%H2183>unfaithfulness;<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%> commits <S%H2181>great<s%> <S%H2181>adultery,<s%> <S%H310>forsaking<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
So he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1586>Gomer<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1691>Diblaim;<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> him a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7121>him,<s%> "Call his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3157>Jezreel;<s%> for yet a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H6485>while,<s%> and I will avenge the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> and will cause the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7673>cease.<s%>
It will happen in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>"

She conceived <S%H2029>again,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter.<s%> Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7121>him,<s%> "Call her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3819>Lo-Ruhamah;<s%> for I will no longer have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that I <S%H5375>should<s%> in any way pardon <S%H5375>them.<s%>

But I will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and will <S%H3467>save<s%> them by <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and will not <S%H3467>save<s%> them by <S%H7198>bow,<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> or <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>"
Now when she had <S%H1580>weaned<s%> <S%H3819>Lo-Ruhamah,<s%> she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%>
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3818>Lo-Ammi;<s%> for you are not my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will not be yours.

Yet the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> which <S%H4058>can't<s%> be measured nor <S%H5608>numbered;<s%> and it will come to pass <S%H4725>that,<s%> in the place where it was <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5971>them,<s%> 'You are not my people,' they will be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H1121><s%> 'sons of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>'

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and they will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> themselves <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7218>head,<s%> and will go <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H776>land;<s%> for <S%H1419>great<s%> will be the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>
